SKT_FIRST.name: Blade Dance
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. On the caster's turn, gains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource: Natural Talent</color>.If the target is <color=#28d9ed>Water</color>, gains <color=#28d9ed>20</color> <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵を攻撃し、自分のターンなら<color=#28d9ed>固有資源:天賦の才能</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>獲得。対象が<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>の場合、自身の<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20</color>獲得。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 타고난 재능</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.\n대상이 <color=#28d9ed>수속성</color> 일 경우 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20</color> 획득합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。在自己的回合,获得<color=#28d9ed>1</color><color=#28d9ed>「固有资源:天赋」</color>。若目标为<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>,额外获得<color=#28d9ed>20</color><color=#28d9ed>AP</color>。

4_jp: 【生まれつきの才能】の獲得量+1

SKT_SECOND.name: Pulse, Release!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. On the caster's turn, gains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource: Natural Talent</color>. This skill ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> enemies. <color=#ffd732>Irregular Monsters</color>: Deals increased damage.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵を攻撃し、自分のターンなら<color=#28d9ed>固有資源:天賦の才能</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>獲得。 このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>または<color=#28d9ed>回復型</color>の敵の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視。 <color=#ffd732>イレギュラーモンスター</color>へのダメージ増加。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격하고 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 타고난 재능</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다. 

이 스킬은 <color=#28d9ed>수속성</color> 또는 <color=#28d9ed>회복형</color> 적의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시합니다.

<color=#ffd732>이레귤러 몬스터</color> 공격 시 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。在自己的回合,获得<color=#28d9ed>1</color><color=#28d9ed>「固有资源:天赋」</color>。 此技能无视<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>或<color=#28d9ed>回复型</color>敌人<color=#28d9ed>30%</color><color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>。 对<color=#ffd732>异型怪</color>造成额外伤害。

5_jp: 【生まれつきの才能】の獲得量+1

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces cooldown of Pulse, Release! by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n【パルス全開】のスキルターン-2ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 伤害提升\n能量释放冷却时间-2回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nExpands attack range\nResets skill cooldown of Faster than Bullets!
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp:
強化スキルに変更
攻撃範囲拡大
【弾丸よりも早く!】の
スキルターン初期化
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n공격 범위 확대\n총알보다 빠르게! 쿨타임 초기화
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n扩大攻击范围\n重置快如子弹!冷却时间

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Faster than Bullets!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. On the caster's turn, gains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource: Natural Talent</color>. Enemies killed by this skill that are <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> cannot be revived, and bosses take increased damage. If holding <color=#28d9ed>5</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent</color>, consumes all to reset the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Faster Than a Bullet!</color> and ignore <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>. <color=#ffd732>Irregular Monsters</color>: Deals increased damage.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵を攻撃し、自分のターンなら<color=#28d9ed>固有資源:天賦の才能</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>獲得。このスキルで倒された<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>または<color=#28d9ed>回復型</color>の敵は復活・蘇生不可、ボスには追加ダメージ。<color=#28d9ed>天賦の才能</color>を<color=#28d9ed>5</color>所持している場合、全て消費して<color=#28d9ed>「弾丸より速く!」</color>のスキルターンを全回復し、<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視。<color=#ffd732>イレギュラーモンスター</color>へのダメージ増加。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격하고 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 타고난 재능</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.
이 스킬로 사망한 <color=#28d9ed>수속성</color> 또는 <color=#28d9ed>회복형</color> 적은 부활 및 소생이 불가능하며 보스에게는 더 큰 피해를 입힙니다.
<color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 타고난 재능</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>5개</color> 보유 시, 모두 소모하여 <color=#28d9ed>총알보다 빠르게!</color> 스킬의 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>모두</color> 회복시키고 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시합니다.

<color=#ffd732>이레귤러 몬스터</color> 공격 시 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。在自己的回合,获得<color=#28d9ed>1</color><color=#28d9ed>「固有资源:天赋」</color>。 被此技能击杀的<color=#28d9ed>水属性</color>或<color=#28d9ed>回复型</color>敌人无法复活,对Boss造成的伤害提高。 若持有<color=#28d9ed>5</color><color=#28d9ed>天赋</color>,则全部消耗以重置<color=#28d9ed>「比子弹更快!」</color>的冷却,并无视<color=#28d9ed>30%</color><color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>。 对<color=#ffd732>异型怪</color>造成额外伤害。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>15</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分のAPを<color=#28d9ed>15</color>獲得させる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>15</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:攻击后,使全体友军的技能冷却时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:自身的AP恢复<color=#28d9ed>15</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
